name: Prize Machine Surprise
description:
Prize Machine Surprise is a free, fun machine simulator where you can collect lots of different cool toy prizes.

No need to travel to your local supermarket or grocery store to use vending machines when you have your very own in your pocket.

Lots of cool prizes to win including, bouncy balls, fidget spinners, toy figures, cute bear collectibles and many more, can you collect them all!

Will the prize ball drop into a winner slot or will you lose the prize, there is only one way to find out!

Prize Machine Surprise is totally free and is a great game for kids of all ages!
This is the full app.
